line_1: Whose sullen frown the gentle godhead scared;
line_2: His wings alone the fiercer flame has spared;

line_1: No cry of woe its peaceful bound'ries scar'd,
line_2: 'Twas thus this hallow'd spot misfortune spar'd,

line_1: Tyrannick Monarchs, as with Thunder scar'd,
line_2: Sent up their Prayers impending Fates to ward;

line_1: Let wanton Wives by Death be scar'd:
line_2: But, to my Comfort, I'm prepar'd.
